comment_text: I want to know what motors this guy is running on this thing.  he is only using 8 so they have to have a amazing power to weight ratio.  I mean I want to know because I'm working on something that needs that kind of power.

Is it dangerous still? Darn right. There's a reason they are called human blenders.
